transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: They look better on the floor.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey Zorak! You made a mess on the floor there, buddy.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey! (off-camera Boom is heard) That's for knockin' my teeth out!

transcript.speaker: Taylor Hanson
transcript.dialogue: Where's the love in this room?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ha, now you boys have teeth, don't ya?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Look at that! Three boys with teeth! And hair. Beautiful girl hair.

transcript.speaker: Taylor Hanson
transcript.dialogue: What are you trying to say?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: The little one looks like Claudia Schiffer.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, you can comb it WITH MY FRICKIN' TEETH!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Take a little of this with ya! (incoherent struggling)...like a lobster!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh, that's me. Um, I gotta take this. (he lowers himself beneath circular keyboard)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Anyone have a comb? Who's got a comb?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I think I got a rake.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Um, all right. I'll do it in five minutes.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, just go buy a comb.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I'll do it! In five minutes.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Wait! I've got it! Construct a robot, name it "Orlando" and program it to go purchase a comb for Hanson.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: What does it look like I'm doing?

transcript.speaker: Isaac Hanson
transcript.dialogue: I like it when, when Zorak gets blown up.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Is that what Hanson wants? Then let me make it about to happen.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You look like a big blowfish! (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ha ha! Maybe I should call you "Hootie"! Ha ha ha!

transcript.speaker: Taylor Hanson
transcript.dialogue: No, I want to be shot! Please!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So, you like the lasers, do ya?

transcript.speaker: Taylor Hanson
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, can you get us too? Get... just shoot us all three.

transcript.speaker: Isaac Hanson
transcript.dialogue: No, no, no. I'm gonna...I'm gonna move.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm gonna do the trick shot, Moltar. Check this out!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey, remember how cool it was the last time? When I did the trick shot?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: All right, screw it! (to Hanson) Now don't go tellin' your dad on me!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Walk it off, Zach. Walk it off.

transcript.speaker: Taylor Hanson
transcript.dialogue: Oh man. Maybe you should use the eleven.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You want yours now, young man?

transcript.speaker: Taylor Hanson
transcript.dialogue: Okay, a little lower. Little lower. Little lower.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You don't want it lower. Heh heh. Zorak, take a picture of us.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh wait, I want Orlando in the picture! Orlando? Where's Orlando?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: That was fun. Blow me up again!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Blow me up! Blow me up again!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Don't you want your picture taken with Hanson?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: C'mon! Blow me-- (Space Ghost blasts Zorak again) Aggghh!!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh, uh, you know what? I made him, but then he was...bad-mouthin'...you all over the set. So I exiled him from the building.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Heads-up thinking, Moltar. Come down here for your reward.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You guys, you shouldn't have-- (Space Ghost starts smacking Moltar)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Liar! Liar! Liar! Liar! Liar! Liar! Liar! Liar! Liar! Liar!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Liar! Liar! Liar! Liar! Where do you get off?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, I'm just kiddin'. It's just my little way of promoting you!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yep! You're the new vice president of this general area except for my desk! And, uh, take care of your brother while we're gone.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Where do you think? To get these boys a comb! Come on, Hanson! Let's go camping!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And his whole head was made of bacon!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughing) Oh, that was a good one. Hey, you boys ever hear the story of The Oasis of the Headless Mad Comber of Comb Mountain?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Crickets. (blasts, followed by an off-camera scream) Legend has it you can hear him, (off-camera scream) every night about this time. Sharpening his comb. His pink, plastic comb. Asking his victims, "Part on the right, or the left?" Hooks for feet...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hooks for feet! Eyes made of wood. Combing. Combing. Harder and harder until you were dead!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ones say he just disappeared. Others say he's still here. Combing. Combing. Combing! (pulls out comb) Oh no! Oh no!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey, I gotta go to the bathroom.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So how's about this for a crib?

transcript.speaker: Hanson
transcript.dialogue: Whoa! (all three praise and bow to Space Ghost)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I like it. Hey look! My show's on!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: We should probably... go back there.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I love driving you boys around. Driving Hanson comes naturally to me.

transcript.speaker: Isaac Hanson
transcript.dialogue: I think "Space Ghost" sounds really kind of cool, you know?

transcript.speaker: Taylor Hanson
transcript.dialogue: You know, this entire show he's been talking about how awesome Space Ghost...you are.

transcript.speaker: Taylor Hanson
transcript.dialogue: He's just, he's suckin' up. I think...

transcript.speaker: Isaac Hanson
transcript.dialogue: I wanna, I, I wanna, I wanna...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I guess I really ought to be watching where we're going, but I'm not.

transcript.speaker: Isaac Hanson
transcript.dialogue: Do we get a, a cool invisible thing that makes us invisible?

transcript.speaker: Zachary Hanson
transcript.dialogue: Like one of those belts things?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Seatbelts? Those are for nerds. You boys aren't nerds, are ya? 'Cause this ain't the nerd taxi.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Driving is so boring. Let's sing a song.

transcript.speaker: Isaac Hanson
transcript.dialogue: You need to be more parental.

transcript.speaker: Taylor Hanson
transcript.dialogue: No he doesn't. He's Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, mind your own business, Isaac.

transcript.speaker: Hanson
transcript.dialogue: A boom boom boom boom Space Ghost! A boom boom boom boom MOLTAR! A boom boom boom boom ZORAK! A boom boom boom boom SPACE GHOST!

transcript.speaker: Hanson
transcript.dialogue: A boom boom boom boom SPACE GHOST!

transcript.speaker: Hanson
transcript.dialogue: A boom boom boom boom MOLTAR!

transcript.speaker: Hanson
transcript.dialogue: A boom boom boom boom MOLTAR!

transcript.speaker: Hanson
transcript.dialogue: A boom boom boom boom ZORAK!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: ZORAK! A boom boom boom boom WATCH OUT!

transcript.speaker: Isaac Hanson
transcript.dialogue: Be careful. That, that's a dangerous weapon that you have on there.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You saw me hit that old lady. And I can't have this on my record.

transcript.speaker: Taylor Hanson
transcript.dialogue: How about we just run and you can...

transcript.speaker: Isaac Hanson
transcript.dialogue: We'll, we'll, we'll teleport out of here.

transcript.speaker: Taylor Hanson
transcript.dialogue: What are you trying to say?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What I'm trying to say is, "A boom boom boom boom GOOD-BYE!"

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh! Han-son! Yeah, we got that comb!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, and, uh, then I took 'em home to be with their dad.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Then why is he on the phone looking for 'em? At his house?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, how can I talk to Mr. Hanson after I just mowed down the Tooth Fairy?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Why would he care? He don't even know the Tooth Fairy!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Maybe because I hurled his sons into space to dispose of them because they were witnesses? Ya think he might care about that, Moltar? Do ya?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: She was on fire, Moltar. You know, fire?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: So I can get into clubs.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Because I don't have any teeth!

transcript.speaker: Santa
transcript.dialogue: Ho ho ho ho ho ho!

transcript.speaker: Santa
transcript.dialogue: Christmas isn't about getting into clubs, Zorak!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Hi Santa!! Didja get my letter?

transcript.speaker: Santa
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost! You've destroyed the Tooth Fairy.

transcript.speaker: Santa
transcript.dialogue: I know when you've been bad and good, and you've been very good! I've been trying to kill her myself for years! Ho ho ho ho ho ho!!

transcript.speaker: Santa
transcript.dialogue: So that I could be the Tooth Fairy, Moltar. Then Santa could use all the little children's teeth to make bizarre and twisted toys for Santa's own amusement! Ho ho ho ho ho!!!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (thinking to himself) That doesn't sound like the Santa I know.

transcript.speaker: Santa
transcript.dialogue: (in evil voice) Because I'm not the Santa you know! I'm Bizarro Santa! From the Electroid Dimension!

transcript.speaker: Tooth Fairy
transcript.dialogue: No, Space Ghost. You destroyed a robot built to look like me.

transcript.speaker: Tooth Fairy
transcript.dialogue: Bizarro Santa has been trying to kill me for years.

transcript.speaker: Bizarro Santa
transcript.dialogue: Ho ho ho-oh Tannebaum! You gonna believe that fairy tale? Trust in me. I'm the good one.

transcript.speaker: Tooth Fairy
transcript.dialogue: No, Space Ghost! I'm the good one!

transcript.speaker: Bizarro Santa
transcript.dialogue: Ho ho ho! Silence! (Bizarro Santa throws the Tooth Fairy across the set with his tail)

transcript.speaker: Bizarro Santa
transcript.dialogue: Ho ho ho! Give me the teeth!

transcript.speaker: Bizarro Santa
transcript.dialogue: I have plans for those teeth!

transcript.speaker: Bizarro Santa
transcript.dialogue: You'll never get into a club!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: What if I have a date?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: All right, everybody! Just hold on a second!

transcript.speaker: Italian-Speaking Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ah, Space Ghost, why you sit there with the power bands... you try to make me mad? Why can't you just be nice?

transcript.speaker: Italian-Speaking Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Soon, Space Ghost, we will go to war.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: No, no! It's gotta be heated! Heat it up!
